summary: The Family Caregiver Program has provided financial and other types of assistance to caregivers of veterans seriously injured in the line of duty since 9/11. VA is still working on implementing a new IT system for the program, which will allow it to expand the program to help all veterans’ caregivers as required by the VA MISSION Act of 2018. VA doesn’t have the data...
title: VA Health Care: Actions Needed to Improve Family Caregiver Program
